means: 杈子，干草叉( pitchfork的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: In my experience, devils very rarely wear horns and carry pitchforks.
sentence.Network_cn: 以我的经验来看, 恶棍们很少带有触角和带干草叉的.

sentence.Network_en: Again the villagers came running with their pitchforks to protect the sheep.
sentence.Network_cn: 男孩又嘲笑那些忧心忡忡的村民.

sentence.Network_en: Brennan is measuring pitchforks and spraying them with luminal as Booth shows Gavin the bamboo - framed sunglasses.
sentence.Network_cn: Brennan检查干草叉和喷涂鲁米液.

list.abs: she wears her clothes as if they were thrown on with a pitchfork .她身上的衣服就像被扔在干草叉上。
a prong on an implement such as a fork or pitchfork尖齿叉子或干草叉子等工具上的尖头
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(R) -亿城英语 ... rain out 因下雨取消 rain pitchforks 下大雨 rain shoes 雨鞋.
大雨如注还能用downpour,the rain is pouring down1)rain pitchforks 下瓢泼大雨2)rain chicken coops
层状撕裂 lameller tearing叉式分岔 pitchfork bifurcation查尔特隆 chaldron

entry.def: A pitchfork is a tool with a long handle and two pointed parts that is used on a farm for lifting hay or cut grass.

auth_sentence.content: He probably figured the pitchforks were waiting for him.
auth_sentence.res_content: He probably figured the pitchforks were waiting for him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He probably figured the pitchforks were waiting for him.

auth_sentence.content: Then they'll come after me with pitchforks and torches.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then they'll come after me with pitchforks and torches.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then they'll come after me with pitchforks and torches.

auth_sentence.content: He says he won't return to Russia until protesters carry Mr. Putin out on pitchforks.
auth_sentence.res_content: He says he won't return to Russia until protesters carry Mr. Putin out on pitchforks.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He says he won't return to Russia until protesters carry Mr. Putin out on pitchforks.
